item.title: add
item.description:
add by wimpi :
Converted and updated documentation to XML and forrest based generation.

Added Modbus/RTU Implementation (Master)

item.title: add
item.description:
add by jdcharlton :
Added Modbus Serial Echo support (RS485)

item.title: add
item.description:
add by wimpi :
Updated BitVector to support starting index from LSB or MSB

item.title: update
item.description:
update by wimpi :
Updated registers and base functions to handle register content as byte[2].

item.title: update
item.description:
update by wimpi :
Updated debug messages to be triggered by net.wimpi.modbus.debug property, that can be passed to the VM on startup.

item.title: update
item.description:
update by wimpi :
Updated LRC calculation.

item.title: add
item.description:
add by wimpi :
Reduced overhead and enhanced speed by changing the way message I/O is handled (see Transportable, FastByteArray I/O)

item.title: add
item.description:
add by wimpi :
Added missing standard request and response for WRITE MULTIPLE COILS

item.title: add
item.description:
add by wimpi :
Added facades providing Modbus/TCP and Modbus/UDP master functionality
